entry.title: WIND WARNING, Vauxhall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 a.m. MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
